Articles.Content:
This is just a very simple patch that modifies the Rapier to act and behave just like a real world Nuclear rocket hybrid engine that just so happens to be based off the Sabre engine.

sounds dull right? wrong! included in my mod is a craft that demonstrates how perprostrosly OP this engine can get, and i dare you to try.

https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/372/The%20Atomic%20RAPIER
right-o, will get on trying to create a repository, my bad
In particular, you'll need to add your license to the zip (and the OP), and give credit / link / license for the bundled ModuleManager dll.
Licensing of information, that is free to everyone always amused me
I can't download it, I get a 404 error.
